team.operation_notes: Organization flattened to eliminate unnecessary middle management layers. Primary objective of the re-org: align with principles and unleash the potential of the company. Plan to increase headcount to 130 by end of year.

product_updates.description: DROID.002 spacecraft ready to launch (early March 2025).
STARFIRE software contract with Japanese conglomerate IHI; paid trial contract; Singapore expected by end of Q1.
Mothership v1 architecture simplified; micro-DROID can rendezvous and capture with DROID.alpha, no hardware changes needed; enables faster market expansion (debris removal, life extension, etc.)
product_updates.impact: Saves two years of vehicle development and broadens addressable market.

product_updates.description: STARFIRE platform integrating first Satellogic images; increases imaging capacity by >10x.

events.description: Strategic financing contract with US Space Force awarded, first milestone (Systems Readiness Review) completed.

notes:
From concept to GEO in 3 years. $32.6M fixed price contract with Space Force for 3 satellites (2 LEO, 1 GEO). High pipeline with Singapore, Western Europe, Parsons, and SIGINT projects. Plans to launch and commission 
DROID.002 in Q1 2025, and expand to 4x satellites in 2026, plus first GEO in 2027. Ambitious infrastructure expansion via Morningstar Fleet. Missed phase 2 SBIR with Missile Defense Agency but deprioritized.
